parameters.name: handleErrors
parameters.label: Evaluate all states as errors (except for 2xx and 3xx )

expect.name: shareCookies
expect.label: Share cookies with other HTTP modules

expect.name: rejectUnauthorized
expect.label: Reject connections that are using unverified (self-signed) certificates

expect.name: useQuerystring
expect.label: Disable serialization of multiple same query string keys as arrays

mapper.html:
{{9.name}},

🎉 Congratulations! Here is your certificate, which is now minted on the NEAR blockchain!



We really appreciate that you attended the NCD session on {{formatDate(get(9.`start datetime (from schedule)`; 1); "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm"; "UTC ")}} UTC and then submitted a NEAR project, which we have reviewed and approved as demonstrating your proficiency in working with smart contracts on NEAR Protocol.

We look forward to seeing you share your certificates on Twitter and LinkedIn! (Simply click into an individual certificate and then use the Twitter or LinkedIn sharing links underneath which automatically tag us.)

Be sure to mention your certificate whenever applying for grants, fellowships, or jobs. You'll stand out!

Thanks for joining us in the mission to build the Open Web,
NEAR Foundation's Education Team

P.S. We always love hearing any feedback.

P.P.S. You are among the first to receive a certificate! Can you please do us a favor and reply to this email to give us your feedback? We want to know what you think.
mapper.subject: {{9.name}} is a {{7.fldRB7i1wKpVC83aO[]}} (with an NFT minted to prove it)
